definitions.meaning: Dejar (a alguien o algo) en un lugar
definitions.usage_example: Can you drop me off at the next corner?
definitions.alternative_example: Can you leave me at the next corner?

definitions.usage_example: Sales always drop off after Christmas.
definitions.usage_example_es: Las ventas siempre caen después de Navidad.

definitions.usage_example: I dropped off during the boring movie.
definitions.alternative_example: I fell asleep during the boring movie.
definitions.usage_example_es: Me quedé dormido durante la película aburrida.

definitions.usage_example: He dropped out of college after one semester.
definitions.alternative_example: He quit college after one semester.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él abandonó la universidad después de un semestre.

definitions.meaning: Visitar (a alguien) de pasada, sin avisar
definitions.usage_example: I'll drop by your office later today.
definitions.alternative_example: I'll visit your office informally later today.
definitions.usage_example_es: Pasaré por tu oficina más tarde hoy.

definitions.usage_example: Feel free to drop in anytime you're in town.
definitions.alternative_example: Feel free to visit informally anytime you're in town.
definitions.usage_example_es: Siéntete libre de pasar a visitar cuando estés en la ciudad.
